name: Lesser Heal (Skill Card)
text:
Priest / Skill / Hero Power
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
You cannot use this Skill on your first turn.
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can use 1 of the following Skills:
? Increase your LP by 600.
? Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 1000 DEF.
§3Hearthstone Rule:
This Skill can be used on your first turn. This Skill costs 2 Mana to use. The Skills that increase LP or gain DEF, restores LP or restores DEF instead.§r
